title: U.N. fears "massacre" in Syria's Ghouta
text:
U.N. fears "massacre" in Syria's Ghouta 3:31pm EST - 01:41 
Warplanes are pounding Syria's eastern Ghouta for the fifth day running. The U.N. wants a truce to prevent what it says could be a ''massacre'', but that's likely to be difficult to get through the security council.   
Warplanes are pounding Syria's eastern Ghouta for the fifth day running. The U.N. wants a truce to prevent what it says could be a "massacre", but that's likely to be difficult to get through the security council.  //reut.rs/2CBTW8j
